name: 楊韻華
objective:
教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
This course aims to enhance Non-English-major students’ English competence through reading business-related articles and global news issues. This course centers its focus on trainings of reading skills, listening comprehension and oral communication.
schedule:
Week 1: Orientation / Reading ESP & NY Times
Week 2: Reading NY Times 
Week 3-8: Chapters of English for Management / News 
Week 9: TOEIC Mock Test 1
Week 10-17: Chapters of English for Management /News 
Week 18: TOEIC Mock Test 2 + Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Grading 
(1)　　Recorded Presentations & Class Participation 20%
(2)　　Attendance 30% (10% deduction penalty for each absence) 
(3)　　TOEIC Mock Tests  15% X 2 =30%
(4)　　Final Exam 20%
materials: Taipei Tech ESP Series / News reports from major news media
